comment: Super easy class and chill professor. Would definitely take a class with him again!
This professor is great!! Tests are in person and super easy but he does take attendance, go to class and engage with him and you will pass easily! I would definitely take him again and again!

Professor Rodney is amazing, and I can't say enough about him. His lectures are amazing and yes attendance is mandatory, if you miss a day it's okay just communicate with him. and he offers internships to his students. I took professor Rodney for 3 semesters and I would take him again.

Easiest class at KSU. He's also such a great and caring person, and a great connection to have if you want to get into the CJ field. One group project which is very easy. Attendance matters but you can still miss days and get an A. Absolutely take him, I genuinely loved going to class and actually learned a lot. Such a cool class!!!
rating_tags: Caring--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: His lectures are enjoyable to sit through and it's kinda impossible to fail his class. You're only graded on a midterm, final, and group project at the end of the term. The tests are only ten questions each and super easy. He does grade attendance, so just show up and do the project and you're pretty much guaranteed an A.

Rodney's classes are so easy. If you want an A then Attendance is Mandatory. He makes his lectures seem like he's having a conversation which makes his class fun. I would take him again for sure. I've taken him twice and so far class has been great, if you answer questions then he'll speed up class. There are 4 group projects a midterm and a final.

Professor Hendrix was honestly one of my easiest classes. He only gives a midterm and final which he goes over in class. Didn't need the textbook at all; he also gave us real life examples and showed us some of his cases.

Someone I think everyone should take at least once; not only is it an easy A if you show up, but I learn more in his class than in others. He loves group discussions, answering any questions we have about his career, and will do anything he can to help you succeed. I wish he taught more than CJ so other students could experience Professor Hendrix.
Dr. Hendrix is very personable and his lectures weren't too complex, but I still feel like I learned a lot.  Class isn't too difficult, just go to class an you'll get an A.

There were only 4 group assignments (extremely easy), and he made the midterm and final easy. He did have an attendance sheet but I only went every few weeks (I signed my name on the sheet for days I missed lol). He's very caring and we have a lot of discussions in class. He makes sure students are well and have all the resources they need. 10/10

Great professor. Attendance is not mandatory but there is almost no work outside class so I would highly recommend attending. No tests, only a few assignments during the semester, and he makes the midterm and final very easy. Would gladly take again.

Wow! he is such an outstanding person and is an amazing professor. He takes time to see if anyone needs anything and is there for students more than most professors. He works in law so he really knows his stuff. Mandatory attendance, 2 tests and 1 group paper super easy. Loves sharing his personal stories that are relevant to class and hearing ours

TAKE THIS CLASS!!! Hes amazing and yet so chill. 5 questions quizzes which we review in class days before and its easy. I took him for a night class and normally Im tired/bored but his lectures are a breeze and sometimes lets his students out early if he finishes ahead of time.

I have never felt the need to rate a professor more than Professor Hendrix. He was absolutely amazing! I took Criminal Inv with him and I loved every second of it. No joke he is such a nice guy and he will 100% work with you for whatever you need.

I took Crimes and Defenses with Rodney and he has been one of my favorite CJ professors I've ever had. He keeps class very interesting and really puts his students first. He is not a difficult grader and responds to emails quickly. Quizzes are easy and he MAKES SURE you will pass, just show up to class. Theres always one quiz and one disc. post
